title: In Champion select and it asking me to Restart thus giving Que dodge
body:
Everytime i get into champion i get this notification asking me to Restart because league has crashed! now i have tried to fix through many things it not on my side at all. Also when i start up my game it goes black and kicks me out! im tired of getting this que dodge timer when it is not my fault! Its leterally going to make it hard for me to ever get out of this easy elo but i can't because league wont even let me play!!!!! How do i go from season 6 silver 1 to winning 7 out of 10 placement matches and getting thrown into bronze 1??? that makes no sense to me!! Please Help Why did you guys need to make such big changes when the game was already working perfectly now its going down and down down and down and im not the only one getting affecteed by this!
Thanks

replies.body: Are you on the updated or legacy client?  Are you also using any third party programs like play.tv?  They've been known to cause crashes like this in champion select, so your best bet is to remove it if it's the case.  Let me know!
